thumb.title: "Yarimasuneぇ Pit"
thumb.description: Verse 11145 rhyme in my pocket, 514 in my soul やりますねぇ crowd jumpin’ outta control 兄貴のvoice loop, on my stereo roll Switch my flow, BBQ in the mosh hole Dream in the meme, I’m awake in the scene やめてくれよ… still I’m chasin’ my dream Knee deep in the sweat, bass loud like scream From Nico to street, turn the net into cream*Yarimasuneぇ! (HEY!) Yarimasuneぇ! (HEY!) 数字で韻踏む ready OK *Pitに飛び込め make my dayVerse 2バーベキューPit to the hardcore set 上下左右 crowd lose they neck Brother in the cut, with the beer on deck 110番 call? nah, we just flex 押忍！アニキ from the pixel world Chain link break when the flag unfurl Clip再生 one more swirl Meme turn flame, see the magic unfurl*Yarimasuneぇ! (HEY!) Yarimasuneぇ! (HEY!) 数字で韻踏む ready OK *Pitに飛び込め make my dayやめてくれよ… bass too loud 兄貴smile in the middle of the crowd Switch my flow like clip on loop From meme to dream, now we own this groupLast Hook（倍速＆絶叫）Yarimasuneぇ! Yarimasuneぇ! Pit in the floor, we go insane! Yarimasuneぇ! Yarimasuneぇ! ネットの地獄を光に変え！
